Review: The beer tasted lunchbox. Fries were ok but im not sure about the special sauce. It was like a garlic mayonnaise with sugar, nu uh, made me feel weird for the rest of the night. But generally a nice local bar and just the right amount of dirty! …
A water hole that represents the best of everything that Malmö are. The service gives you warm people, and the pizza is not bad at all here. …
This margherita pizza was not worth 95sek. It tastes like a toast with cheese. A bit disappointed.
Atmosphere that makes you want to want to spend your summer here. Pizzas that hit the spot on any bender. Warmly recommended!
Very good sunny outside area. Though there was a tree in the way.
Large choice of pizza (including vegan), cheap beers, often parties or other events in the basement during the weekend. very friendly atmosphere and unpretentious.
Warm welcome from the staffs. The lady who served drinks was very friendly. Nice outdoor seats if you wanna enjoy the sun. Price is reasonable.

I’m vegan and I’ve been eating here from time to time and I would say it’s the better pizza places out of the low tiers… but today me and my friend were served cow cheese on our vegetarian(mostly vegan) pizzas even though we asked for vegan cheese. A bit of a bummer I have to say, but never again.
Typical neighborhood bar. Nothing special on the outside, nothing special on the inside but it has so much life and atmosphere that it draws you in. Recommended!
Nice place for gathering, but please fix the light bulbs down stairs if that's part of your business. Next time I guess we should bring our torches with ourselves to light up the room.

Just ran into this pub/pizzeria and was super surprised by the pizza. Hands down, I did not have such a good pizza in a while and did not expect it to be that good to be honest (having judged by the pub’s outer appearance). Plus, we were …
+ Pizza is good (thin, crisp bottom, perfect amount of filling) + Serves beer and wine + serving outside had evening sun so the place has potential. …

I never write reviews..but I feel like this place is such a little gem, not trying too hard to be anything else then what it is. The thing that does it for me here is the thin crust, good cheese and tomato sauce...good veggie pizza options …
Malmös living room! Great bar food, biljardtables, stand up shows and fun music.
You need to order on the bar. Pizza was outstanding, while schnitzel was really made bu Coop probably. So... Go for pizza in any case …
The most amazing glutenfree pizza in Malmö. They allow dogs and have the best attitude ever. Sweet staff and will serve at the table!!
Pub, pizzeria, pool, people. What more do you need. Still something is lacking, probably a real bar would help.

BEST PIZZA EVER! I ordered a Marinara with ham but sadly i got the wrong pizza (Margerita with ham) deliviered to my home. I asked them to send me the right pizza and so they later did. I got hungry while waiting so i ate some of the …
Super expensive beer, small thin pizzas
Very good Pizza! Actually decent value overall, despite the beer being priced just a tad above cheap. Will reccomend!

Cute little local pub close to Nobel square, fair prices and okay pizza (and they even make vegan options), tends to be visited by an interesting mix of younger hipsters and older locals, one of the legendary sunkhaks (shabby joints) of Nobel
Really good pizza, decent beer selection, and a good atmosphere. They also have a big coffee table to play board games on!
5 stars - try the pizza
Pizzas are ok, but they serve the worst failed attempt at saucesea for their pizzas I've ever tasted. Stay away from the bearnease! Beer is ok
It looks a little run down, but it's a really nice pub. The employees are welcoming, the pizza is great, the prices are fair and they are dog friendly.
Very nice place to hang out with friends. You can drink beer, order pizza and shoot some pool. All around a good time.
Great, cheap pizza. You can use the basement for events for free if the people consume drinks and food from the bar.
A bar how I like them - great mixed crowd. David, the bartender was very helpful.
Great place with quick staff! Sometimes they host some events in the basement! Can recommend!
One of the oldest pubs in town with a long history. Good atmosphere and there is a pool table available!
Nice place if you love to meet people friendly atmosphere, play Snooker, Play Bingo. Eat Pizza and A Bar for drinking lover.
Love the atmosphere and the options of ping pong, billiard and cheap beer. Also good and cheap vegan pizza options!
Cheap and cheerful bar with great pizza. Cheap pool and other bar games available. Accepts Swish payments too!
Amazing gluten free pizza. Best we had in all of Scandinavia!
Nice place, full on weekends.

Just took a pizza for takeout but very mixed with guests, everyone seemed happy, plenty of space and a small outdoor seating area. The staff was nice and the pizza was really nice. What more could you ask for from a neighborhood restaurant?
The pizza was good, a typical greasy pizza, which I like, and with a good price. Several different types of vegan pizzas are offered. …
A nice and spacious pizzeria that also has a pool table and slot machines. OK food, relatively large selection of beers. Fair prices. Very nice and service-minded staff.
Well, shared a PIZZA with Dad. Kebab DeLuxe TODAY 124:-. Played Billiards 8-Ball a 20:-, but you CANNOT LIFT UP LOWERED Balls. Beer from 55:- to 75:-. GOOD COMMUNITY... A NICE CHOICE.. …

Classic neighborhood restaurant with good pizzas, lots of flavor and not too small in content. One of the most generous pizzas you can eat, stinginess does not exist here, the only downside is that the pizza is quite greasy, the pizza is dripping with oil. Recommended when you are hungover on a gray Sunday …
Cheap beer, good pizza, nice atmosphere and a little too crowded to play pool but I love it …
Vattenhålet, very strong and legendary place. Good pizzas and nice hangout, possibility for billiards, video slots and more.. Jetski simply

Otherwise I think it's good at Rex but had a pretty sad experience ordering pizza on Christmas Eve. Had called the day before to make sure they were open, got a response by 5:00 PM. We call at 3:45 PM and get a response that it's closed and the woman quickly hung up. They clearly didn't want any more orders.

Quite okay pizza! Took a vegetarian kebab pizza and a chicken pizza. Would have liked more salt in the dough and a crispier bottom. The topping and the white sauce were good. Nice staff but a little confused.
